title: What is the main purpose of the Care Act of 2014? - Quora

response.answer_text: he Care Act 2014 encourages caregivers to take a person-centered approach when safeguarding vulnerable adults. When you follow the principles, you too place the vulnerable person's well being and needs at the forefront of safeguarding processes. They help you directly involve the vulnerable person
To enrich and empower private health unsurance corporations, and make sure healthcare justice for all (with tremendous savings in dollars and lives) will “never ever” be allowed to happen here.
